General.Name: Wonik Cube Corp
General.Description: Wonik Cube Corp. distributes industrial materials. It imports and sells basic chemicals, raw materials, etc. for paint, ink, adhesive, paper, artificial marble, electronic material, synthetic leather, and textile sectors. The company also supplies PC, PET, PETG, PMMA, and ULTEM products for use in electrical, electronic, automotive, medical, sheet, filament, and miscellaneous applications; and sells various silicon products, including momentive product fluids, silans, resins, and coatings that are used in applications, such as electronic, chemical fiber, construction, etc. In addition, it offers interior and exterior building materials; and sells digital printers, upgrading parts, and consumables, as well as provides training and technical support services. Further, the company provides hybrid conductive inks and films. The company was formerly known as Hunus Inc. and changed its name to Wonik Cube Corp. in September 2013. Wonik Cube Corp. was founded in 1975 and is based in Seongnam, South Korea.
